artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Various fabric samples all constructed using 'beige malachite' warp. Twill weave sampler; eight different colorways sampled on beige and green warp. Two selvedge edges. (beige, green, yellow, orange, brown, gold)
title: Beige Malachite Warp - Development and Sampling
